p: We firstly calculated species relative dominance based on percentage cover, leaf height and frequency measured at each site as did Wu, et al. 22. Then we defined species richness ( SR) as the total number of species at each quadrat (Plot_SR). Next, we calculated Shannon index of diversity (Shannon), Simpson index of diversity (Simpson), and Pielou evenness index (Pielou) 53. Plot-SR, Shannon, Simpson and Pielou were grouped as plant species diversity (PSD) indices.
